titles.title: Hallelujah, I want to praise You,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, I want to praise You,
Hallelujah, with thanks in my heart.
Hallelujah, I want to praise You,
Hallelujah, praise ye the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And how can words express the thanks in my heart?
And how can singing a song praise You enough?
And how can lifting my hands
Show how much I love You?
From the depths of my heart, hallelujah!
